text: Nowadays, financial transactions are extremely sophisticated, since they must adapt to the needs of the markets. Our experience in this sector allows us to make financial burdens more efficient through the fiscal analysis of the various types of financing, whether for the purposes of those who grant them or those who receive them, in Mexico, abroad and even through exchanges. values. We provide tax advice on financial operations derived from currencies, capital, credit and debt, carried out both in stock markets and outside them, as well as in operations of all types carried out with cryptocurrencies.
